member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi
member.summary: Encapsulates classes exposed by DWNAPI.DLL

member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_BLURBEHIND_Mask
member.summary: Flags used by the DWM_BLURBEHIND structure to indicate which of its members contain valid information.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_BLURBEHIND_Mask.DWM_BB_ENABLE
member.summary: A value for the fEnable member has been specified.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_BLURBEHIND_Mask.DWM_BB_BLURREGION

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_BLURBEHIND_Mask.DWM_BB_TRANSITIONONMAXIMIZED
member.summary: A value for the fTransitionOnMaximized member has been specified.

member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_CLOAKED
member.summary: Flags used by the DwmSetWindowAttribute function to specify the cloaking reason

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_CLOAKED.DWM_CLOAKED_APP
member.summary: The window was cloaked by its owner application.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_CLOAKED.DWM_CLOAKED_SHELL
member.summary: The window was cloaked by the Shell.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_CLOAKED.DWM_CLOAKED_INHERITED
member.summary: The cloak value was inherited from its owner window.

member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_SETICONICPREVIEW_Flags
member.summary: The display options for the live preview.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_SETICONICPREVIEW_Flags.DWM_SIT_NONE
member.summary: No frame is displayed around the provided thumbnail.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_SETICONICPREVIEW_Flags.DWM_SIT_DISPLAYFRAME
member.summary: Displays a frame around the provided bitmap.

member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_SHOWCONTACT
member.summary: Visualizations that DWM should show for a contact.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_SHOWCONTACT.DWMSC_NONE
member.summary: No visual feedback should be shown in reponse to the contact.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_SHOWCONTACT.DWMSC_DOWN
member.summary: Show the "contact down" animation, such as would be used in a button press.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_SHOWCONTACT.DWMSC_UP
member.summary: Show the "contact up" animation, such as would be used in a button release.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_SHOWCONTACT.DWMSC_DRAG
member.summary: Show the "contact drag" animation when the UI element that was selected by the touch or pen is dragged.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_SHOWCONTACT.DWMSC_HOLD
member.summary: Show a visual while the contact is held down, such as holding down a button.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_SHOWCONTACT.DWMSC_PENBARREL
member.summary: Show the pen barrel visual when the pen barrel button is pressed.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_SHOWCONTACT.DWMSC_ALL
member.summary: Show any of the animations if called for.

member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TAB_WINDOW_REQUIREMENTS
member.summary: Returned by DwmGetUnmetTabRequirements to indicate the requirements needed for a window to put tabs in the application title bar.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TAB_WINDOW_REQUIREMENTS.DWMTWR_NONE
member.summary: The window meets all requirements requested.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TAB_WINDOW_REQUIREMENTS.DWMTWR_IMPLEMENTED_BY_SYSTEM
member.summary: In some configurations, the admin/user setting or mode of the system means that windows won't be tabbed. This requirement indicates that the system mode must implement tabbing. If the system does not implement tabbing, nothing can be done to change this.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TAB_WINDOW_REQUIREMENTS.DWMTWR_WINDOW_RELATIONSHIP
member.summary: The window has an owner or parent, and is therefore ineligible for tabbing.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TAB_WINDOW_REQUIREMENTS.DWMTWR_WINDOW_STYLES
member.summary: The window has one or more styles that make it ineligible for tabbing. To be eligible for tabbing, a window must:

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TAB_WINDOW_REQUIREMENTS.DWMTWR_WINDOW_REGION
member.summary: The window has a region (set using SetWindowRgn) making it ineligible.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TAB_WINDOW_REQUIREMENTS.DWMTWR_WINDOW_DWM_ATTRIBUTES
member.summary: The window is ineligible due to its Dwm configuration. To resolve this issue, the window must not extended its client area into the title bar using DwmExtendFrameIntoClientArea. In addition, the window must not have DWMWA_NCRENDERING_POLICY set to DWMNCRP_ENABLED.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TAB_WINDOW_REQUIREMENTS.DWMTWR_WINDOW_MARGINS
member.summary: The window is ineligible due to its margins, most likely due to custom handling in WM_NCCALCSIZE. To resolve this issue, the window must use the default window margins for the non-client area.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TAB_WINDOW_REQUIREMENTS.DWMTWR_TABBING_ENABLED
member.summary: The window has been explicitly opted out by setting DWMWA_TABBING_ENABLED to false.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TAB_WINDOW_REQUIREMENTS.DWMTWR_USER_POLICY
member.summary: The user has configured this application to not participate in tabbing.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TAB_WINDOW_REQUIREMENTS.DWMTWR_GROUP_POLICY
member.summary: The group policy has configured this application to not participate in tabbing.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TAB_WINDOW_REQUIREMENTS.DWMTWR_APP_COMPAT
member.summary: This is set if app compat has blocked tabs for this window. Can be overridden per window by setting DWMWA_TABBING_ENABLED to TRUE. That does not override any other tabbing requirements.

member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TNP

member.summary: A value for the rcDestination member has been specified.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TNP.DWM_TNP_RECTSOURCE
member.summary: A value for the rcSource member has been specified.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TNP.DWM_TNP_OPACITY
member.summary: A value for the opacity member has been specified.

member.summary: A value for the fVisible member has been specified.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TNP.DWM_TNP_SOURCECLIENTAREAONLY
member.summary: A value for the fSourceClientAreaOnly member has been specified.

member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWMFLIP3DWINDOWPOLICY
member.summary: Flags used by the DwmSetWindowAttribute function to specify the Flip3D window policy.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWMFLIP3DWINDOWPOLICY.DWMFLIP3D_DEFAULT
member.summary: Use the window's style and visibility settings to determine whether to hide or include the window in Flip3D rendering.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWMFLIP3DWINDOWPOLICY.DWMFLIP3D_EXCLUDEBELOW
member.summary: Exclude the window from Flip3D and display it below the Flip3D rendering.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWMFLIP3DWINDOWPOLICY.DWMFLIP3D_EXCLUDEABOVE
member.summary: Exclude the window from Flip3D and display it above the Flip3D rendering.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWMFLIP3DWINDOWPOLICY.DWMFLIP3D_LAST
member.summary: The maximum recognized DWMFLIP3DWINDOWPOLICY value, used for validation purposes.

member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWMNCRENDERINGPOLICY
member.summary: Flags used by the DwmSetWindowAttribute function to specify the non-client area rendering policy.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWMNCRENDERINGPOLICY.DWMNCRP_USEWINDOWSTYLE
member.summary: The non-client rendering area is rendered based on the window style.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWMNCRENDERINGPOLICY.DWMNCRP_DISABLED
member.summary: The non-client area rendering is disabled; the window style is ignored.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWMNCRENDERINGPOLICY.DWMNCRP_ENABLED
member.summary: The non-client area rendering is enabled; the window style is ignored.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWMNCRENDERINGPOLICY.DWMNCRP_LAST
member.summary: The maximum recognized DWMNCRENDERINGPOLICY value, used for validation purposes.

member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWMTRANSITION_OWNEDWINDOW_TARGET
member.summary: Identifies the target.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWMTRANSITION_OWNEDWINDOW_TARGET.DWMTRANSITION_OWNEDWINDOW_NULL
member.summary: Indicates no animation.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWMTRANSITION_OWNEDWINDOW_TARGET.DWMTRANSITION_OWNEDWINDOW_REPOSITION
member.summary: Indicates that the window is repositioned.

member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWMWINDOWATTRIBUTE
member.summary: Flags used by the DwmGetWindowAttribute and DwmSetWindowAttribute functions to specify window attributes for non-client rendering.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWMWINDOWATTRIBUTE.DWMWA_NCRENDERING_ENABLED
member.summary: Use with DwmGetWindowAttribute. Discovers whether non-client rendering is enabled. The retrieved value is of type BOOL. TRUE if non-client rendering is enabled; otherwise, FALSE.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWMWINDOWATTRIBUTE.DWMWA_NCRENDERING_POLICY
member.summary: Use with DwmSetWindowAttribute. Sets the non-client rendering policy. The pvAttribute parameter points to a value from the DWMNCRENDERINGPOLICY enumeration.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWMWINDOWATTRIBUTE.DWMWA_TRANSITIONS_FORCEDISABLED
member.summary: Use with DwmSetWindowAttribute. Enables or forcibly disables DWM transitions. The pvAttribute parameter points to a value of TRUE to disable transitions or FALSE to enable transitions.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWMWINDOWATTRIBUTE.DWMWA_ALLOW_NCPAINT
F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWMWINDOWATTRIBUTE.DWMWA_CAPTION_BUTTON_BOUNDS
member.summary: Use with DwmGetWindowAttribute. Retrieves the bounds of the caption button area in the window-relative space. The retrieved value is of type RECT.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWMWINDOWATTRIBUTE.DWMWA_NONCLIENT_RTL_LAYOUT
member.summary: Use with DwmSetWindowAttribute. Specifies whether non-client content is right-to-left (RTL) mirrored. The pvAttribute parameter points to a value of TRUE if the non-client content is right-to-left (RTL) mirrored; otherwise, it points to FALSE.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWMWINDOWATTRIBUTE.DWMWA_FORCE_ICONIC_REPRESENTATION
member.summary: Use with DwmSetWindowAttribute. Forces the window to display an iconic thumbnail or peek representation (a static bitmap), even if a live or snapshot representation of the window is available. This value normally is set during a window's creation and not changed throughout the window's lifetime. Some scenarios, however, might require the value to change over time. The pvAttribute parameter points to a value of TRUE to require a iconic thumbnail or peek representation; otherwise, it points to FALSE.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWMWINDOWATTRIBUTE.DWMWA_FLIP3D_POLICY
member.summary: Use with DwmSetWindowAttribute. Sets how Flip3D treats the window. The pvAttribute parameter points to a value from the DWMFLIP3DWINDOWPOLICY enumeration.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWMWINDOWATTRIBUTE.DWMWA_EXTENDED_FRAME_BOUNDS
member.summary: Use with DwmGetWindowAttribute. Retrieves the extended frame bounds rectangle in screen space. The retrieved value is of type RECT.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWMWINDOWATTRIBUTE.DWMWA_HAS_ICONIC_BITMAP
member.summary:
Use with DwmSetWindowAttribute. The window will provide a bitmap for use by DWM as an iconic thumbnail or peek representation (a static bitmap) for the window. DWMWA_HAS_ICONIC_BITMAP can be specified with DWMWA_FORCE_ICONIC_REPRESENTATION. DWMWA_HAS_ICONIC_BITMAP normally is set during a window's creation and not changed throughout the window's lifetime. Some scenarios, however, might require the value to change over time. The pvAttribute parameter points to a value of TRUE to inform DWM that the window will provide an iconic thumbnail or peek representation; otherwise, it points to FALSE.
Windows Vista and earlier: This value is not supported.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWMWINDOWATTRIBUTE.DWMWA_DISALLOW_PEEK
member.summary:
Use with DwmSetWindowAttribute. Do not show peek preview for the window. The peek view shows a full-sized preview of the window when the mouse hovers over the window's thumbnail in the taskbar. If this attribute is set, hovering the mouse pointer over the window's thumbnail dismisses peek (in case another window in the group has a peek preview showing). The pvAttribute parameter points to a value of TRUE to prevent peek functionality or FALSE to allow it.
Windows Vista and earlier: This value is not supported.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWMWINDOWATTRIBUTE.DWMWA_EXCLUDED_FROM_PEEK
member.summary:
Use with DwmSetWindowAttribute. Prevents a window from fading to a glass sheet when peek is invoked. The pvAttribute parameter points to a value of TRUE to prevent the window from fading during another window's peek or FALSE for normal behavior.
Windows Vista and earlier: This value is not supported.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWMWINDOWATTRIBUTE.DWMWA_CLOAK
member.summary:
Use with DwmSetWindowAttribute. Cloaks the window such that it is not visible to the user. The window is still composed by DWM.
Using with DirectComposition: Use the DWMWA_CLOAK flag to cloak the layered child window when animating a representation of the window's content via a DirectComposition visual which has been associated with the layered child window. For more details on this usage case, see How to How to animate the bitmap of a layered child window.
Windows 7 and earlier: This value is not supported.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWMWINDOWATTRIBUTE.DWMWA_CLOAKED
member.summary:
Use with DwmGetWindowAttribute. If the window is cloaked, provides one of the following values explaining why:
Name (Value) Meaning
DWM_CLOAKED_APP 0x0000001 The window was cloaked by its owner application.
DWM_CLOAKED_SHELL 0x0000002 The window was cloaked by the Shell.
DWM_CLOAKED_INHERITED 0x0000004 The cloak value was inherited from its owner window.
Windows 7 and earlier: This value is not supported.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWMWINDOWATTRIBUTE.DWMWA_FREEZE_REPRESENTATION
member.summary:
Use with DwmSetWindowAttribute. Freeze the window's thumbnail image with its current visuals. Do no further live updates on the thumbnail image to match the window's contents.
Windows 7 and earlier: This value is not supported.

member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.GESTURE_TYPE

member.summary: A touch double tap.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.GESTURE_TYPE.GT_TOUCH_RIGHTTAP
member.summary: A touch right tap.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.GESTURE_TYPE.GT_TOUCH_PRESSANDHOLD
member.summary: A touch press and hold.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.GESTURE_TYPE.GT_TOUCH_PRESSANDHOLDABORT

member.summary: A touch press and tap.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DwmDefWindowProc(Vanara.PInvoke.HWND,System.UInt32,System.IntPtr,System.IntPtr,System.IntPtr@)
member.summary: Default window procedure for Desktop Window Manager (DWM) hit testing within the non-client area.
member.param: A handle to the window procedure that received the message.
The message.
Specifies additional message information. The content of this parameter depends on the value of the msg parameter.
Specifies additional message information. The content of this parameter depends on the value of the msg parameter.
A pointer to an LRESULT value that, when this method returns successfully,receives the result of the hit test.
member.returns: TRUE if DwmDefWindowProc handled the message; otherwise, FALSE.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DwmEnableBlurBehindWindow(Vanara.PInvoke.HWND,Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_BLURBEHIND@)
member.summary: Enables the blur effect on a specified window.
member.param: The handle to the window on which the blur behind data is applied.
A pointer to a DWM_BLURBEHIND structure that provides blur behind data.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DwmEnableComposition(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enables or disables Desktop Window Manager (DWM) composition. This function is deprecated as of Windows 8. DWM can no longer be programmatically disabled.
member.param: DWM_EC_ENABLECOMPOSITION to enable DWM composition; DWM_EC_DISABLECOMPOSITION to disable composition. As of Windows 8, calling this function with DWM_EC_DISABLECOMPOSITION has no effect. However, the function will still return a success code.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DwmEnableMMCSS(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Notifies the Desktop Window Manager (DWM) to opt in to or out of Multimedia Class Schedule Service (MMCSS) scheduling while the calling process is alive.
member.param: TRUE to instruct DWM to participate in MMCSS scheduling; FALSE to opt out or end participation in MMCSS scheduling.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DwmExtendFrameIntoClientArea(Vanara.PInvoke.HWND,Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.MARGINS@)
member.summary: Extends the window frame into the client area.
member.param: The handle to the window in which the frame will be extended into the client area.
A pointer to a MARGINS structure that describes the margins to use when extending the frame into the client area.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DwmFlush
member.summary: Issues a flush call that blocks the caller until the next present, when all of the Microsoft DirectX surface updates that are currently outstanding have been made. This compensates for very complex scenes or calling processes with very low priority.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DwmGetColorizationColor(System.UInt32@,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Retrieves the current color used for Desktop Window Manager (DWM) glass composition. This value is based on the current color scheme and can be modified by the user. Applications can listen for color changes by handling the WM_DWMCOLORIZATIONCOLORCHANGED notification.
member.param: A pointer to a value that, when this function returns successfully, receives the current color used for glass composition. The color format of the value is 0xAARRGGBB.
A pointer to a value that, when this function returns successfully, indicates whether the color is an opaque blend. TRUE if the color is an opaque blend; otherwise, FALSE.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DwmGetCompositionTimingInfo(Vanara.PInvoke.HWND,Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO@)
member.summary: Retrieves the current composition timing information for a specified window.
member.param: The handle to the window for which the composition timing information should be retrieved. Starting with Windows 8.1, this parameter must be set to NULL. If this parameter is not set to NULL, DwmGetCompositionTimingInfo returns E_INVALIDARG.

A pointer to a DWM_TIMING_INFO structure that, when this function returns successfully, receives the current composition timing information for the window. The cbSize member of this structure must be set before this function is called.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DwmGetTransportAttributes(System.Boolean@,System.Boolean@,System.UInt32@)
member.summary: Retrieves transport attributes.
member.param: A pointer to a BOOL value that indicates whether the transport supports remoting. TRUE if the transport supports remoting; otherwise, FALSE.
A pointer to a BOOL value that indicates whether the transport is connected. TRUE if the transport is connected; otherwise, FALSE.
A pointer to a DWORD that receives a generation value for the transport.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DwmGetUnmetTabRequirements(Vanara.PInvoke.HWND,Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TAB_WINDOW_REQUIREMENTS@)

summary.para: Note This function is publicly available, but nonfunctional, for Windows 10, version 1803.
Checks the requirements needed to get tabs in the application title bar for the specified window.

member.param: The handle of the window to check.
The value.
member.returns: None

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DwmGetWindowAttribute(Vanara.PInvoke.HWND,Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWMWINDOWATTRIBUTE,System.IntPtr,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves the current value of a specified attribute applied to a window.
member.param: The handle to the window from which the attribute data is retrieved.
The attribute to retrieve, specified as a DWMWINDOWATTRIBUTE value.
A pointer to a value that, when this function returns successfully, receives the current value of the attribute. The type of the retrieved value depends on the value of the dwAttribute parameter.
The size of the DWMWINDOWATTRIBUTE value being retrieved. The size is dependent on the type of the pvAttribute parameter.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DwmGetWindowAttribute``1(Vanara.PInvoke.HWND,Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWMWINDOWATTRIBUTE,``0@)
member.summary: Retrieves the current value of a specified attribute applied to a window.
member.param: The handle to the window from which the attribute data is retrieved.
The attribute to retrieve, specified as a DWMWINDOWATTRIBUTE value.
A value that, when this function returns successfully, receives the current value of the attribute. The type of the retrieved value depends on the value of the dwAttribute parameter.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DwmInvalidateIconicBitmaps(Vanara.PInvoke.HWND)
member.summary: Called by an application to indicate that all previously provided iconic bitmaps from a window, both thumbnails and peek representations, should be refreshed.
member.param: A handle to the window or tab whose bitmaps are being invalidated through this call. This window must belong to the calling process.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
member.remarks: Calling this function causes the Desktop Window Manager (DWM) to invalidate its current bitmaps for the window and request new bitmaps from the window when they are next needed. DwmInvalidateIconicBitmaps should not be called frequently. Doing so can lead to poor performance as new bitmaps are created and retrieved.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DwmIsCompositionEnabled(System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Obtains a value that indicates whether Desktop Window Manager (DWM) composition is enabled. Applications on machines running Windows 7 or earlier can listen for composition state changes by handling the WM_DWMCOMPOSITIONCHANGED notification.
member.param: A pointer to a value that, when this function returns successfully, receives TRUE if DWM composition is enabled; otherwise, FALSE. As of Windows 8, DWM composition is always enabled. If an app declares Windows 8 compatibility in their manifest, this function will receive a value of TRUE through pfEnabled. If no such manifest entry is found, Windows 8 compatibility is not assumed and this function receives a value of FALSE through pfEnabled. This is done so that older programs that interpret a value of TRUE to imply that high contrast mode is off can continue to make the correct decisions about rendering their images. (Note that this is a bad practiceâ€”you should use the SystemParametersInfo function with the SPI_GETHIGHCONTRAST flag to determine the state of high contrast mode.)
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DwmpGetColorizationParameters(Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_COLORIZATION_PARAMS@)
member.summary: Gets the colorization parameters.
member.param: The parameters.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DwmpSetColorizationParameters(Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_COLORIZATION_PARAMS@,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Sets the colorization parameters.
member.param: The parameters.
Always set to 1.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DwmQueryThumbnailSourceSize(Vanara.PInvoke.HTHUMBNAIL,Vanara.PInvoke.SIZE@)
member.summary: Retrieves the source size of the Desktop Window Manager (DWM) thumbnail.
member.param: A handle to the thumbnail to retrieve the source window size from.
A pointer to a SIZE structure that, when this function returns successfully, receives the size of the source thumbnail.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DwmRegisterThumbnail(Vanara.PInvoke.HWND,Vanara.PInvoke.HWND,Vanara.PInvoke.HTHUMBNAIL@)
member.summary: Creates a Desktop Window Manager (DWM) thumbnail relationship between the destination and source windows.
member.param: The handle to the window that will use the DWM thumbnail. Setting the destination window handle to anything other than a top-level window type will result in a return value of E_INVALIDARG.
The handle to the window to use as the thumbnail source. Setting the source window handle to anything other than a top-level window type will result in a return value of E_INVALIDARG.
A pointer to a handle that, when this function returns successfully, represents the registration of the DWM thumbnail.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DwmRenderGesture(Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.GESTURE_TYPE,System.UInt32,System.UInt32@,System.Drawing.Point[])
member.summary: Notifies Desktop Window Manager (DWM) that a touch contact has been recognized as a gesture, and that DWM should draw feedback for that gesture.
member.param: The type of gesture, specified as one of the GESTURE_TYPE values.
The number of contact points.
The pointer ID.
The points.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DwmSetIconicLivePreviewBitmap(Vanara.PInvoke.HWND,Vanara.PInvoke.HBITMAP,System.Drawing.Point@,Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_SETICONICPREVIEW_Flags)
member.summary: Sets a static, iconic bitmap to display a live preview (also known as a Peek preview) of a window or tab. The taskbar can use this bitmap to show a full-sized preview of a window or tab.
member.param: A handle to the window. This window must belong to the calling process.
A handle to the bitmap to represent the window that hwnd specifies.

The offset of a tab window's client region (the content area inside the client window frame) from the host window's frame. This offset enables the tab window's contents to be drawn correctly in a live preview when it is drawn without its frame.
The display options for the live preview.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DwmSetIconicLivePreviewBitmap(Vanara.PInvoke.HWND,Vanara.PInvoke.HBITMAP,System.IntPtr,Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_SETICONICPREVIEW_Flags)
member.summary: Sets a static, iconic bitmap to display a live preview (also known as a Peek preview) of a window or tab. The taskbar can use this bitmap to show a full-sized preview of a window or tab.
member.param: A handle to the window. This window must belong to the calling process.
A handle to the bitmap to represent the window that hwnd specifies.

The offset of a tab window's client region (the content area inside the client window frame) from the host window's frame. This offset enables the tab window's contents to be drawn correctly in a live preview when it is drawn without its frame.
The display options for the live preview.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DwmSetIconicThumbnail(Vanara.PInvoke.HWND,Vanara.PInvoke.HBITMAP,Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_SETICONICPREVIEW_Flags)
member.summary: Sets a static, iconic bitmap on a window or tab to use as a thumbnail representation. The taskbar can use this bitmap as a thumbnail switch target for the window or tab.
member.param: A handle to the window. This window must belong to the calling process.
A handle to the bitmap to represent the window that hwnd specifies.
The display options for the live preview.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DwmSetWindowAttribute(Vanara.PInvoke.HWND,Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWMWINDOWATTRIBUTE,System.IntPtr,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the value of non-client rendering attributes for a window.
member.param: The handle to the window that will receive the attributes.
A single DWMWINDOWATTRIBUTE flag to apply to the window. This parameter specifies the attribute and the pvAttribute parameter points to the value of that attribute.
A pointer to the value of the attribute specified in the dwAttribute parameter. Different DWMWINDOWATTRIBUTE flags require different value types.
The size, in bytes, of the value type pointed to by the pvAttribute parameter.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DwmSetWindowAttribute``1(Vanara.PInvoke.HWND,Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWMWINDOWATTRIBUTE,``0)
member.summary: Sets the value of non-client rendering attributes for a window.
member.param: The handle to the window that will receive the attributes.
A single DWMWINDOWATTRIBUTE flag to apply to the window. This parameter specifies the attribute and the pvAttribute parameter points to the value of that attribute.
The value of the attribute specified in the dwAttribute parameter. Different DWMWINDOWATTRIBUTE flags require different value types.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DwmShowContact(System.UInt32,Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_SHOWCONTACT)
member.summary: Called by an app or framework to specify the visual feedback type to draw in response to a particular touch or pen contact.
member.param: The pointer ID of the contact. Each touch or pen contact is given a unique ID when it is detected.
One or more of the following DWM_SHOWCONTACT visualizations that DWM should show for this contact.
member.returns: If dwPointerID does not match that of a contact currently present on the screen, this function returns E_INVALIDARG; otherwise, it returns S_OK.

member.summary: Enables the graphical feedback of touch and drag interactions to the user.
member.param: The pointer ID.
Indicates whether the contact is enabled.
The tether.

member.summary: Coordinates the animations of tool windows with the Desktop Window Manager (DWM).

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DwmUnregisterThumbnail(Vanara.PInvoke.HTHUMBNAIL)
member.summary: Removes a Desktop Window Manager (DWM) thumbnail relationship created by the DwmRegisterThumbnail function.
member.param: The handle to the thumbnail relationship to be removed. Null or non-existent handles will result in a return value of E_INVALIDARG.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Updates the properties for a Desktop Window Manager (DWM) thumbnail.

param.name: hThumbnailId
param.para: The handle to the DWM thumbnail to be updated. Null or invalid thumbnails, as well as thumbnails owned by other processes will result in a return value of E_INVALIDARG.

param.name: ptnProperties
param.para: A pointer to a DWM_THUMBNAIL_PROPERTIES structure that contains the new thumbnail properties.

returns.para: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: Thumbnail relationships created by the DwmRegisterThumbnail function will not be rendered to the destination window until this function is called. Subsequent calls will update the thumbnail according to the provided properties.
The following example demonstrates how to register and display the desktop thumbnail.

member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_BLURBEHIND
member.summary: Specifies Desktop Window Manager (DWM) blur-behind properties. Used by the DwmEnableBlurBehindWindow function.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_BLURBEHIND.dwFlags
member.summary: A bitwise combination of DWM Blur Behind constant values that indicates which of the members of this structure have been set.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_BLURBEHIND.fEnable
member.summary: TRUE to register the window handle to DWM blur behind; FALSE to unregister the window handle from DWM blur behind.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_BLURBEHIND.hRgnBlur
member.summary: The region within the client area where the blur behind will be applied. A NULL value will apply the blur behind the entire client area.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_BLURBEHIND.fTransitionOnMaximized
member.summary: TRUE if the window's colorization should transition to match the maximized windows; otherwise, FALSE.

member.name: M:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_BLURBEHIND.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the struct.
member.param: if set to true enabled.

member.name: P:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_BLURBEHIND.Region
member.summary: Gets the region.

member.name: P:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_BLURBEHIND.TransitionOnMaximized
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the window's colorization should transition to match the maximized windows.
member.value: true if the window's colorization should transition to match the maximized windows; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Sets the region.

The region.

member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_COLORIZATION_PARAMS
member.summary: Structure to get colorization information using the function.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_COLORIZATION_PARAMS.clrColor
member.summary: The ARGB accent color.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_COLORIZATION_PARAMS.clrAfterGlow
member.summary: The ARGB after glow color.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_COLORIZATION_PARAMS.nIntensity
member.summary: Determines how much the glass streaks are visible in window borders.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_COLORIZATION_PARAMS.clrAfterGlowBalance
member.summary: Determines how bright the glass is (0 removes all color from borders).

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_COLORIZATION_PARAMS.clrBlurBalance
member.summary: Determines how bright the blur is.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_COLORIZATION_PARAMS.clrGlassReflectionIntensity
member.summary: Determines how much the glass reflection is visible.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_COLORIZATION_PARAMS.fOpaque
member.summary: Determines if borders are opaque ( true) or transparent ( false).

member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_THUMBNAIL_PROPERTIES
member.summary: Specifies Desktop Window Manager (DWM) thumbnail properties. Used by the DwmUpdateThumbnailProperties function.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_THUMBNAIL_PROPERTIES.dwFlags
member.summary: A bitwise combination of DWM thumbnail constant values that indicates which members of this structure are set.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_THUMBNAIL_PROPERTIES.rcDestination
member.summary: The area in the destination window where the thumbnail will be rendered.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_THUMBNAIL_PROPERTIES.rcSource
member.summary: The region of the source window to use as the thumbnail. By default, the entire window is used as the thumbnail.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_THUMBNAIL_PROPERTIES.opacity
member.summary: The opacity with which to render the thumbnail. 0 is fully transparent while 255 is fully opaque. The default value is 255.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_THUMBNAIL_PROPERTIES.fVisible
member.summary: TRUE to make the thumbnail visible; otherwise, FALSE. The default is FALSE.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_THUMBNAIL_PROPERTIES.fSourceClientAreaOnly
member.summary: TRUE to use only the thumbnail source's client area; otherwise, FALSE. The default is FALSE.

member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO
member.summary: Specifies Desktop Window Manager (DWM) composition timing information. Used by the DwmGetCompositionTimingInfo function.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO.cbSize
member.summary: The size of this DWM_TIMING_INFO structure.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO.rateRefresh
member.summary: The monitor refresh rate.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO.qpcRefreshPeriod
member.summary: The monitor refresh period.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO.rateCompose
member.summary: The composition rate.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO.qpcVBlank
member.summary: The query performance counter value before the vertical blank.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO.cRefresh
member.summary: The DWM refresh counter.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO.cDXRefresh
member.summary: The DirectX refresh counter.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO.qpcCompose
member.summary: The query performance counter value for a frame composition.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO.cFrame
member.summary: The frame number that was composed at qpcCompose.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO.cDXPresent
member.summary: The DirectX present number used to identify rendering frames.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO.cRefreshFrame
member.summary: The refresh count of the frame that was composed at qpcCompose.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO.cFrameSubmitted
member.summary: The DWM frame number that was last submitted.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO.cDXPresentSubmitted
member.summary: The DirectX present number that was last submitted.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO.cFrameConfirmed
member.summary: The DWM frame number that was last confirmed as presented.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO.cDXPresentConfirmed
member.summary: The DirectX present number that was last confirmed as presented.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO.cRefreshConfirmed
member.summary: The target refresh count of the last frame confirmed as completed by the GPU.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO.cDXRefreshConfirmed
member.summary: The DirectX refresh count when the frame was confirmed as presented.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO.cFramesLate
member.summary: The number of frames the DWM presented late.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO.cFramesOutstanding
member.summary: The number of composition frames that have been issued but have not been confirmed as completed.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO.cFrameDisplayed
member.summary: The last frame displayed.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO.qpcFrameDisplayed
member.summary: The QPC time of the composition pass when the frame was displayed.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO.cRefreshFrameDisplayed
member.summary: The vertical refresh count when the frame should have become visible.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO.cFrameComplete
member.summary: The ID of the last frame marked as completed.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO.qpcFrameComplete
member.summary: The QPC time when the last frame was marked as completed.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO.cFramePending
member.summary: The ID of the last frame marked as pending.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO.qpcFramePending
member.summary: The QPC time when the last frame was marked as pending.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO.cFramesDisplayed
member.summary: The number of unique frames displayed. This value is valid only after a second call to the DwmGetCompositionTimingInfo function.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO.cFramesComplete
member.summary: The number of new completed frames that have been received.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO.cFramesPending
member.summary: The number of new frames submitted to DirectX but not yet completed.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO.cFramesAvailable
member.summary: The number of frames available but not displayed, used, or dropped. This value is valid only after a second call to DwmGetCompositionTimingInfo.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO.cFramesDropped
member.summary: The number of rendered frames that were never displayed because composition occurred too late. This value is valid only after a second call to DwmGetCompositionTimingInfo.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO.cFramesMissed
member.summary: The number of times an old frame was composed when a new frame should have been used but was not available.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO.cRefreshNextDisplayed
member.summary: The frame count at which the next frame is scheduled to be displayed.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO.cRefreshNextPresented
member.summary: The frame count at which the next DirectX present is scheduled to be displayed.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO.cRefreshesDisplayed
member.summary: The total number of refreshes that have been displayed for the application since the DwmSetPresentParameters function was last called.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO.cRefreshesPresented
member.summary: The total number of refreshes that have been presented by the application since DwmSetPresentParameters was last called.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO.cRefreshStarted
member.summary: The refresh number when content for this window started to be displayed.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO.cPixelsReceived
member.summary: The total number of pixels DirectX redirected to the DWM.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO.cPixelsDrawn
member.summary: The number of pixels drawn.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.DwmApi.DWM_TIMING_INFO.cBuffersEmpty
member.summary: The number of empty buffers in the flip chain.
